AUTHOR: Yoda
QUOTE: Train yourself to let go of everything you fear to lose.

AUTHOR: Yoda
QUOTE: Do, or do not. There is no try.

AUTHOR: Yoda
QUOTE: The greatest teacher, failure is.

AUTHOR: Yoda
QUOTE: Much to learn, you still have.

AUTHOR: Yoda
QUOTE: Adventure. Excitement. A Jedi craves not these things.

AUTHOR: Yoda
QUOTE: Size matters not. Look at me. Judge me by my size, do you?

AUTHOR: Yoda
QUOTE: Fear is the path to the dark side.

AUTHOR: Yoda
QUOTE: Your friends are not who you think they are.

AUTHOR: Yoda
QUOTE: In the end, cowards are those who follow the dark side.

AUTHOR: Yoda
QUOTE: A Jedi uses the Force for knowledge and defense, never for attack.

AUTHOR: Yoda
QUOTE: Wisdom is the weapon to defeat ignorance.

AUTHOR: Yoda
QUOTE: Knowledge and wisdom, pebbles on the path to enlightenment.

AUTHOR: Yoda
QUOTE: In knowledge, there is power; in wisdom, there is peace.

AUTHOR: Yoda
QUOTE: A mind that seeks knowledge is never stagnant.

AUTHOR: Yoda
QUOTE: The more you learn, the more you can teach.

AUTHOR: Yoda
QUOTE: True wisdom comes from the journey, not the destination.

AUTHOR: Yoda
QUOTE: Listen to the lessons in every moment.

AUTHOR: Yoda
QUOTE: Seek knowledge, and you shall find your path.

AUTHOR: Yoda
QUOTE: Wisdom flows through the ages; embrace it.

AUTHOR: Yoda
QUOTE: Knowledge acquired without experience is empty.

AUTHOR: Yoda
QUOTE: Do not let fear control your destiny.

AUTHOR: Yoda
QUOTE: Mastery comes from confronting your fears.

AUTHOR: Yoda
QUOTE: Fall, we all must; rise again, we can.

AUTHOR: Yoda
QUOTE: In overcoming fear, we find strength.

AUTHOR: Yoda
QUOTE: The dark side is fueled by fear.

AUTHOR: Yoda
QUOTE: Face your fears and conquer them.

AUTHOR: Yoda
QUOTE: Your fear is a great teacher; learn from it.

AUTHOR: Yoda
QUOTE: Train you must, or fallen short you will be.

AUTHOR: Yoda
QUOTE: Mastery cannot be rushed; time it takes.

AUTHOR: Yoda
QUOTE: Learn, we must, from every failure.

AUTHOR: Yoda
QUOTE: Use the Force wisely; its power is great.

AUTHOR: Yoda
QUOTE: Patience you must have, my young Padawan.

AUTHOR: Yoda
QUOTE: Persistence is the key; never give up.
